name: Gligar
flavorText:
It flies straight
at its target's
face then clamps down on the star­
tled victim to
inject poison.

previous.name: Dunsparce
previous.flavorText:
When spotted, this
POKéMON escapes
backward by furi­ ously boring into
the ground with
its tail.

next.name: Steelix
next.flavorText:
It is thought its body transformed
as a result of iron accumulating
internally from swallowing soil.

It flies straight

pokemon.name: Gliscor
pokemon.flavorText:
It observes prey while hanging
inverted from branches. When the
chance presents itself, it swoops!
